parent.location.reload(true);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateComments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var editorWrapper = $('#UnderwritingError');

//alert(editorWrapper.length);
if(editorWrapper.length === 0 && skuid.page.params.id)
{
    var editorWrapper = $('#UWErrorTitle');
}

//var model = arguments[0].model, row = arguments[0].row;
//model.updateRow(row, {Underwriting__c:''});

//var row = arguments[0].row;
//alert("Test"+row);
//console.log(skuid.page.params);
//console.log(underwritingModel.data);
var editor = editorWrapper.data('object').editor;
var underwritingModel = skuid.model.getModel('Underwriting');
var uwRow = underwritingModel.data[0];


var affordabilitycomment = uwRow.genesis_Affordability_comment__c;
var affordabilitycommentFieldLen = underwritingModel.getField('genesis_Affordability_comment__c').length||255;

//alert("affordabilitycommentFieldLen : "+underwritingModel.getField('genesis_Affordability_comment__c').length);
//alert(affordabilitycomment.length);
//alert(Underwriting__C.genesis_Affordability_comment__c);

var cabotcomment = uwRow.genesis_Cabot_Comment__c;
var cabotcommentFieldLen = underwritingModel.getField('genesis_Cabot_Comment__c').length||255;

var error = false;
editor.clearMessages();
if(affordabilitycomment && affordabilitycomment.length>affordabilitycommentFieldLen){
    
    editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Affordability comment: data value too large (max length='+affordabilitycommentFieldLen+')',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        error = true;
}

if(cabotcomment && cabotcomment.length>cabotcommentFieldLen){
    
    editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Cabot comment: data value too large (max length='+cabotcommentFieldLen+')',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        error = true;
}

if(error === true)
{
    return false;
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Underwritinghistory" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var uwRow,uwhRow,uwCom;
var underwritingHistroy = skuid.model.getModel('underwritingHistory');
if(underwritingHistroy)
uwhRow = underwritingHistroy.data[0];

var Underwriting = skuid.model.getModel('Underwriting');
if(Underwriting)
uwRow = Underwriting.data[0];

if(uwhRow && uwhRow.genesis_Internal_fraud_screening__c)
uwRow.genesis_Internal_fraud_screening__c = uwhRow.genesis_Internal_fraud_screening__c;

if(uwhRow && uwhRow.genesis_Rate_to_Reflect_Risk__c)
uwRow.genesis_Rate_to_Reflect_Risk__c = uwhRow.genesis_Rate_to_Reflect_Risk__c;

if(uwhRow && uwhRow.genesis_Recommend_to_Cabot__c)
uwRow.genesis_Recommend_to_Cabot__c = uwhRow.genesis_Recommend_to_Cabot__c;





</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="copyUnderwritingConditions" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
// Fetch Currently Inserted Underwriting ID
var appId = params && params.row && params.row.Id||'';

// Fetch Last Underwriting Id
var underwritingHistory = skuid.model.getModel('underwritingHistory');
var lastUWId = underwritingHistory && underwritingHistory.data[0] && underwritingHistory.data[0].Id || '';

// Fetch Comments from 
var UnderwriterComments = skuid.model.getModel('UnderwriterComments');
var fetchLastUWC = UnderwriterComments && UnderwriterComments.data || '';

var results = fetchLastUWC.filter(function (entry) { return entry.Underwriting__c === lastUWId; });

var isNew = fetchLastUWC.filter(function (entry) { return entry.Underwriting__c === appId; });


if(results && results.length>0 && isNew && isNew.length === 0)
{
    $.each(results,function(i,row){
        
        // Add rows to UnderwriterComments model
        var NewUnderwriterComments = UnderwriterComments.createRow({ 
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'Underwriting__c', value: params.row.Id },
                    { field: 'Condition__c', value: row.Condition__c},
                    { field: 'Application__c', value: row.Application__c }
                ]
            });
        
    });
}


//Save Underwriting Conditions of UnderwriterComments model
if(results && results.length>0)
skuid.model.save([UnderwriterComments]);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateApplicationFields" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var uwRow,ApplicationRow;

var ApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('application');
ApplicationRow = ApplicationModel.data[0];

//var Underwriting = skuid.model.getModel('Underwriting');
var Underwriting = skuid.model.getModel('UnderwritingQuality');
if(Underwriting)
{
    uwRow = Underwriting.data[0];
    //console.log(uwRow);
    
    if(uwRow && uwRow.isSubmitted__c && uwRow.genesis_Decision__c === 'Accepted')
    {
         //console.log(uwRow.Asset_quality__c + uwRow.genesis_Customer_quality__c);
         
        ApplicationModel.updateRow(ApplicationRow,'Latest_Underwriter_Quality__c',uwRow.Asset_quality__c + uwRow.genesis_Customer_quality__c);
        ApplicationModel.save();
    }
}

    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .simple-queue.nx-queue {
    border-top: 0;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item{
    color: white;
}
.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item-inner-with-icon {
    height: 30px;
}

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    line-height: 30px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 2px solid white;
    margin: 0 15px 0 0;
}

 /*to get the font content, go https://astronautweb.co/snippet/font-awesome/ */

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon.sk-icon-members:before {
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    content: "\f007";
    padding: 4px;
    font-size: 20px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected > .nx-queue-item-inner {
    color: white;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected .sk-icon {
    color: #48ce94;
    border: 2px solid #48ce94;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item {
    border-left: 5px solid #7f7f7f;
    background: #7f7f7f;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-template {
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-queue-loader {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item:hover {
    border-left: 5px solid #2d5074;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected {
    border-left: 5px solid #48ce94;

skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage showsidebar="true" showheader="true" tabtooverride="skuid__Page__c" unsavedchangeswarning="" enablepersonalization="">
  <labels/>
  <models>
    <model id="PageData" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" doclone="yes" datasourcetype="" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" value="Id" field="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle model="PageData">
      <maintitle>Clone {{Model.Label}}</maintitle>
      <subtitle>
        <template>{{Model.Label}}</template>
      </subtitle>
      <actions>
        <action type="savecancel" afterSave="/{{Id}}" afterCancel="/{{$Param.id}}" saveLabel="Create Cloned Page" window="self">
          <savehotkeys>
            <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
            <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
          </savehotkeys>
          <cancelhotkeys/>
          <renderconditions/>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </pagetitle>
    <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="PageData" mode="edit">
      <columns>
        <column width="100%">
          <sections>
            <section title="New Page Information">
              <fields>
                <field id="Name" required="true"/>
                <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
                <field id="OwnerId">
                  <label>Page Owner</label>
                  <filters/>
                </field>
              </fields>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
      </columns>
    </basicfieldeditor>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="inlineCSS" cachelocation="false">.nx-field.nx-modified .nx-fieldtext {
    color: inherit;
    font-style: inherit;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="inlineJS" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$,
	    $M = skuid.$M,
		utils = skuid.utils,
		registerSnippet = skuid.snippet.register;
		
	skuid.remote.set("skuid.CredentialsManagementController");
	
	registerSnippet('PasswordInput',function(field,value){
		skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,skuid.utils.decodeHTML(value));
		if (field.mode === 'edit') field.element.find(':input').attr({'type':'password','maxlength':'140'});
	});
	
	registerSnippet('MaxLengthInput',function(field,value){
		skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,skuid.utils.decodeHTML(value));
		if (field.mode === 'edit') field.element.find(':input').attr({'maxlength':'140'});
	});

	//	For the rows where we have credentials, populate the Ui-Only fields
	registerSnippet('skuid.modelDataSourceCreds.populateDataSources',function(){
		var dataSourcesModel = $M('cm_ModelDataSources'),
			credsModel = $M('cm_ModelDataSourceCreds'),
			userId = utils.userInfo.userId,
			existingCredsMap = {};
		
	
		//  Build a map of our existing creds
		$.each(credsModel.getRows(),function(){
			var dataSourceName = credsModel.getFieldValue(this,'skuid__Service_Name__c',true),
				appliesTo = credsModel.getFieldValue(this,'skuid__Applies_To__c',true);
			
			if (dataSourceName !== undefined) {
				if (existingCredsMap[dataSourceName] === undefined) existingCredsMap[dataSourceName] = {};
				if (appliesTo !== undefined) {
					existingCredsMap[dataSourceName][appliesTo] = this;
				}
			}
		});
		
		var rowsToUpdate = {};
		//	Iterate through our Model DataSources and create rows that don't exist yet
		$.each(dataSourcesModel.getRows(),function(){
			var row = this,
				dataSourceId = dataSourcesModel.getFieldValue(row,'Id'),
				dataSourceName = dataSourcesModel.getFieldValue(row,'Name',true),
				credMap = existingCredsMap[dataSourceName],
				credRow = credMap && credMap[userId];

			//	If a row for this User for this DataSource was not found, create it
			if (credRow === undefined) {
				credsModel.createRow({
					doAppend : true,
					editModeForNewItems : true,
					additionalConditions : [
						{ field : 'Name__ui', value : dataSourceId + '_' + userId },
						{ field : 'ServiceName__ui', value : dataSourceName },
						{ field : 'AppliesTo__ui', value : userId }
					]
				});
			} 
			//  If it was found, update our UI only fields for Username/Password
			else {
			    rowsToUpdate[credRow.Id] = {
			        'Name__ui' : credsModel.getFieldValue(credRow,'Name',true),
			        'ServiceName__ui' : credsModel.getFieldValue(credRow,'skuid__Service_Name__c',true),
			        'AppliesTo__ui' : credsModel.getFieldValue(credRow,'skuid__Applies_To__c',true),
			        'Username__ui' : credsModel.getFieldValue(credRow,'skuid__Username__c',true),
			        'Password__ui' : credsModel.getFieldValue(credRow,'skuid__Password__c',true)
			    };
			}
		});
		
		if (skuid.utils.size(rowsToUpdate)) {
		    credsModel.updateRows(rowsToUpdate,{ preventTrackChanges : true });
		    $.each(credsModel.registeredFields,function(){
		        this.render();
		    });
		}
	});
	
	//  Snippet to call our custom saving Remote Action
	registerSnippet('skuid.modelDataSourceCreds.saveCreds',function(){
        var credsModel = $M('cm_ModelDataSourceCreds'),
            dfd = $.Deferred(),
            operation = {
              inserts: {},
              updates: {},
              deletes: {}
            };
        
        // We only care about EITHER 
        // (a) Deletions
        // (b) Inserts / updates involving the Username or Password fields
        $.each(credsModel.changes,function(key, obj) {
          var row = credsModel.getRowById(key);
          // Handle deletes
          if (credsModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(row)) {
            operation.deletes[key] = {}; 
          }
          // Handle inserts / updates 
          else if ((obj.Username__ui !== undefined) || (obj.Password__ui !== undefined)) {
            if (credsModel.isRowNew(row)) {
              operation.inserts[key] = obj;
            } else {
              operation.updates[key] = obj;
            }
          }
        });
        
        skuid.CredentialsManagementController.saveCreds(JSON.stringify(operation),function(result){
            if (!result || result.totalSuccess === false) {
                dfd.reject();
            } else {
                dfd.resolve();
            }
        });
        
        return dfd.promise();
	});
	
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        //  Get rid of the "skuid-nav" in our header
        skuid.$C('skuid-nav').unrender().unregister();
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
    </javascript>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

   pageRow = pageModel.getFirstRow(),
   pageRowId = pageRow.Id,
   $ = skuid.$;
if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Page?')) {
   $.blockUI({message: 'Deleting this page...'});
   pageModel.deleteRow(pageRow);
   pageModel.save({callback:function(result){
      if (result.totalsuccess){
         $.blockUI({message: 'Page successfully deleted. Navigating to list of Skuid Mobile Pages...',timeout:2000});
         skuid.utils.redirect({url: '/apex/skuid__UI?page=MobilePageList'}); 
      } else {
         $.unblockUI();
         alert('There was a problem deleting this Page:\n\n' + result.deleteResults[0].message);
      }
   }});
}

      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="SkuidMobileBuildersJS" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="skuid">var params = arguments[0],
   $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="previewPage" cachelocation="false">var pageModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPage'),
   pagePreview = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('skuid.builder.page.preview');			    
pagePreview && pagePreview({
   model: pageModel
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="deleteSelectedPage" cachelocation="false">var pageModel = skuid.$M('SelectedPage'),
   pageRow = pageModel.getFirstRow(),
   pageRowId = pageRow.Id,
   $ = skuid.$;
if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Page?')) {
   pageModel.deleteRow(pageRow);
   pageModel.save({callback:function(result){
      if (result.totalsuccess){
         // Hide the popup panel
          skuid.mobile.hidePopupPanel();
          // Remove the corresponding row from our PageList model
          // then re-render corresponding lists, rather than doing an updateData,
          // to save a server call
          var pagesModel = skuid.$M('MobilePages');
          pagesModel.removeRowById(pageRowId);
          $.each(pagesModel.registeredLists,function(){
              this.render({doNotCache: true});
          });
      } else {
         alert('There was a problem deleting this Page:\n\n' + result.deleteResults[0].message);
      }
   }});
}
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="UtilSnippets" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var titles = $('.nx-pagebuilder-title-main'); 
	    // Theres a weird bug where if you're editing the pagebuilder
	    // with the pagebuilder, 2 titles will appear. So we just remove

	    /*
		if(titles[1]){
		    titles[1].remove();
		}
		*/
		titles.prependTo('.nx-pagebuilder-toolbar-wrapper');
	});
	
	//  Set the new Child Page XML
	skuid.snippet.register('skuid.pagebuilder.setChildPageXML',function(config){
        var model = config.model,
            row = config.row,
            pageXML = '<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes">' +

            		'<javascript/>' +

            	'</skuidpage>';
        
        skuid.utils.writeXmlToPageLayoutFields(pageXML,model,row);
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>

      <cssitem location="inline" name="pageCollaboration" cachelocation="false">.interaction-container {
    margin-top: 3px;
    float: right;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.interaction-container.hibernating {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar {
    display: none;
    position: relative;
    margin-left: 3px;
}

.interaction-avatar IMG {
    background-color: white;
    height: 25px;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerOpened IMG {
    border: solid 1px #212324;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges IMG {
    border: solid 1px red;
}

.interaction-avatar.stale IMG {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: none;
    /* Prevent the warning icon from grabbing the focus and preventing the tooltip from showing */
    pointer-events: none;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
	left: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	color: red;
	text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px black;
}</cssitem>

}

.message-container > .nx-messages:empty {
    display: none;
}</cssitem>

          <searchfields/>
        </skootable>
      </components>
    </pageregioncontent>
  </pageregioncontents>
  <components/>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="PageListJSMax" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){

    //
    // Define extensions to Skuid Salesforce Rest Api wrapper,
	// the base of which is defined in CoreJS.
    // 
    var sfdc = skuid.sfdc,
        api = sfdc.api,
        $ = skuid.$,
        SObject = api.SObject,
        query = api.query,
        escapeMetadataBody = api.escapeMetadataBody,
        registerSnippet = skuid.snippet.register;
    
    // Preview page
    registerSnippet('skuid.pageList.previewPage',function(){
        var params = arguments[0],
            pagePreview = skuid.snippet.get('skuid.builder.page.preview');
        pagePreview && pagePreview({
            model: params.model,
            row: params.item ? params.item.row : params.row
        });
    });
    
    // BytesToKB
    registerSnippet('skuid.pageList.bytesToKBs',function(){
        var	field = arguments[0],
        	value = arguments[1],
        	displayValue = 0;
        
        if ($.isNumeric(value)) {
            displayValue = $.number(value / 1000,1) + ' KB';
        }
        
        skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXT.read(field,displayValue);
    });
    
    // Multipicklist
    registerSnippet('Multipicklist',function(){
        skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.MULTIPICKLIST.edit(arguments[0],skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]));
    });
    
    // This snippet packages a set of Skuid Pages into a StaticResource which we call a "Page Pack."
    // In addition to the standard snippet attributes, its "obj" argument contains the following:
    //		srName (required) - The Name of the Static Resource file to create/update 
    //		srDescription - The Description of the Static Resource file to create/update
    registerSnippet('skuid.page.packagePages', function(obj){
    	
    	var	srName = obj.srName,
    		srDescription = obj.srDescription,
    		srSOQL = 'SELECT Id, Name, Description FROM StaticResource WHERE Name = \'' + srName + '\'',
    		pagesModel = skuid.model.getModel('pgs__pagedata'),
    		pagesToPackage = [],
    		pagesSOQL = 
    			'SELECT Id, Name, skuid__Type__c, skuid__UniqueId__c, skuid__Module__c, skuid__Composer_Settings__c, '
    			    + 'skuid__MasterPage__c, skuid__MasterPage__r.Name, skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__UniqueId__c, skuid__IsMaster__c, '
    				+ 'skuid__Layout__c, skuid__Layout2__c, skuid__Layout3__c, skuid__Layout4__c, skuid__Layout5__c '
    			+ 'FROM skuid__Page__c ' 
    			+ 'WHERE Id IN (\'';
    	
    	// Collect the Ids of the Pages to be packaged and finish building the Page SOQL query string
    	$.each(pagesModel.registeredItems,function() {
    		if (this.selected) {
    			pagesToPackage.push(this.row.Id);
    		}
    	});
    	
    	// If no Pages were selected, display an error and stop packaging
    	if (pagesToPackage.length === 0) {
    		$.blockUI({
    			message: 'Please select at least one Page for your Page Pack', 
    			timeout: 2500
    		});
    		return;
    	}
    	
    	pagesSOQL += pagesToPackage.join('\',\'') + '\') ORDER BY skuid__Module__c, Name';
    	
    	$.blockUI({
    		message: 'Getting Page and StaticResource records...'
    	});
    	
    	// Query for the Static Resource file and the Pages data
    	var srData,
    		srQuery = query(srSOQL),
    		pagesData,
    		pagesQuery = query(pagesSOQL);
    	
    	$.when(pagesQuery).then(function(res){ pagesData = res.records; });
    	$.when(srQuery).then(function(res){ srData = res.records; });
    	
    	$.when(srQuery,pagesQuery).then(function(){
    		
    		var resource,
    			ResourceCreationProcess = $.Deferred();
    		
    		// If this resource already exists, set the Id for updating
    		if (srData.length > 0) {
    			resource = new SObject('StaticResource',{
    				Id : srData[0].Id,
    				CacheControl : 'Private'
    			});
    			ResourceCreationProcess.resolve();
    			
    		// If this resource does not already exists, create a new resource
    		} else {
    			$.blockUI({
    				message: 'Creating StaticResource...'
    			});
    			
    			resource = new SObject('StaticResource',{
    				Name : srName,
    				Description : srDescription,
    				Body : escapeMetadataBody(JSON.stringify([])),
    				CacheControl : 'Private'
    			});
    			
    			resource.insert({
    				success:function(){
    					ResourceCreationProcess.resolve();
    				},
    				error:function(jqXHR){
    					ResourceCreationProcess.reject({
    						resourceName: srName,
    						errorMessage: jqXHR.responseJSON[0].message
    					});
    				}
    			});
    		}
    		
    		$.when(ResourceCreationProcess).then(
    			// SUCCESS handler	
    			function(){
    				$.blockUI({
    				    message: 'Packaging Pages into StaticResource...'
    				});
    				
    				resource.Body = escapeMetadataBody(JSON.stringify(pagesData));
    				resource.ContentType = 'application/json';
    				
    				$.when(resource.update()).then(
    				    // Success
    				    function(){
    				        // Block the UI with a temporary message
        					$.blockUI({
        						message: 'The "' + srName + '" Page Pack was created/updated successfully!', 
        						timeout: 3000
        					});
        					// Close the topmost popup
        					$('.ui-dialog-content').last().dialog('close');
        					// Refresh our pgs__PagesInStaticResources Model
        					skuid.$M('pgs__PagesInStaticResources').updateData();
    				    },
    				    // Failure
    				    function(failureObj){
    				        // Un-block the UI
        					$.blockUI({
            					message: 'There was an error creating the "' + srName + '" Page Pack' 
            					    + ((failureObj && failureObj.errorMessage) ? ':\n\n' + failureObj.errorMessage : '.'), 
            					timeout: 5000
            				});
    				    }
    				);
    			},
    			// FAILURE handler
    			function(failureObj){
    				$.blockUI({
    					message: 'There was an error creating the "' + failureObj.resourceName + '" Page Pack:\n\n' + failureObj.errorMessage, 
    					timeout: 5000
    				});
    			}
    		);
    	});
    });

    registerSnippet('skuid.page.packagePagesInModules',function(obj){

        var model = obj.model,
            row = obj.row,
            modules = model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c',true);
            
        if (!modules){
            window.alert('Please select a Module.');
            return;
        }

        $.blockUI({
            message: 'Retrieving Page and StaticResource records...'
        });

        var uniqueModules = modules.split(";"),
            moduleNamesString = "(\'" + uniqueModules.join("\',\'") + "\') ",
            moduleResourceNamesString = "('" + uniqueModules.join("Pages\',\'") + "Pages\') ",
            
        // Query for StaticResource files in these Modules,
        // and Query for Pages in these Modules.
        // When both queries are done,
        // move on
            resourceQuery = query(
	            "select Id, Name from StaticResource where Name in " + moduleResourceNamesString
	        ),
        	pagesQuery = query(
	            "select Id, Name, skuid__Type__c, skuid__UniqueId__c, skuid__Module__c, skuid__Composer_Settings__c, "
	            + "skuid__MasterPage__c, skuid__MasterPage__r.Name, skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__UniqueId__c, skuid__IsMaster__c, "
	            + "skuid__Layout__c, skuid__Layout2__c, skuid__Layout3__c, skuid__Layout4__c, skuid__Layout5__c "
	            + "from skuid__Page__c where skuid__Module__c in " + moduleNamesString
	            + "order by skuid__Module__c, Name"
	        ),
	        pages,
            resources;

        $.when(pagesQuery).then(function(res){ pages = res.records; });
        $.when(resourceQuery).then(function(res){ resources = res.records; });

        $.when(resourceQuery,pagesQuery).then(function(){

            $.blockUI({
                message: 'Checking for Resources that may need to be created...'
            });

            var resourceByModule = {},
            	resourcesToCreate = {},
            	pagesByModule = {};

            $.each(resources,function(){
                resourceByModule[this.Name.substring(0,this.Name.indexOf('Pages'))]
                    = new SObject('StaticResource',{
                    	Name: this.Name, 
                    	Id: this.Id,
                    	// Put in a dummy body, since we're about to update it
                    	Body: this.Body,
                    	CacheControl : 'Private'
                    });
            });

            $.each(pages,function(){
                var resource = resourceByModule[this.skuid__Module__c],
                	modulePages = pagesByModule[this.skuid__Module__c];
                
                if (!resource) {
                    resourcesToCreate[this.skuid__Module__c] = 1;
                }
                if (!modulePages) {
                    modulePages = pagesByModule[this.skuid__Module__c] = [];
                }
                modulePages.push(this);
            });

            var ResourceCreationProcess = $.Deferred(),
            	outstandingJobs = {};
        
            // Go create any needed StaticResources
            $.each(resourcesToCreate,function(moduleName){
            	
                var resourceName = moduleName+'Pages',
                    resource = new SObject('StaticResource',{
                        Name: resourceName,
                        // Put in a dummy body since we're about to modify it
                        Body: escapeMetadataBody(JSON.stringify([])),
                        CacheControl : 'Private'
                    });
                resourceByModule[moduleName] = resource;

                outstandingJobs[resourceName]=1;

                // Create the Resource
                resource.insert({
                	success:function(){
	                    delete outstandingJobs[resourceName];
	                    if (skuid.utils.size(outstandingJobs)===0) {
	                    	ResourceCreationProcess.resolve();
	                    }
                	},
                	error:function(jqXHR){
                		// If we get a blocking error, then reject our deferred, passing in the error thrown
                		ResourceCreationProcess.reject({
                			resourceName: resourceName,
                			errorMessage: jqXHR.responseJSON[0].message
                		});
                	}
                });
            });
            if (skuid.utils.size(resourcesToCreate)===0) {
            	ResourceCreationProcess.resolve();
            	
            }

            $.when(ResourceCreationProcess).then(
            	// SUCCESS handler	
            	function(){
	            	
	                $.blockUI({
	                    message: 'Packaging Pages into StaticResources...'
	               });
	
	                var ResourceUpdateProcess = $.Deferred(),
	                	numResourcesToUpdate = skuid.utils.size(pagesByModule); 
	                
	                $.each(pagesByModule,function(module,pagesList){
	                    var resource = resourceByModule[module];
	                    if (resource){
	                        resource.Body = escapeMetadataBody(JSON.stringify(pagesList));
	                        resource.ContentType = 'application/json';
	                        $.when(resource.update()).then(function(){
	                        	numResourcesToUpdate--;
	                        	if (numResourcesToUpdate===0) {
	                        		ResourceUpdateProcess.resolve();
	                        	}
	                        });
	                    }
	                });
	                
	                $.when(ResourceUpdateProcess).then(function(){
	                	var srNames = [];
	                	$.each(pagesByModule,function(m){
	                		srNames.push(m+'Pages');
	                	});
	                	$.blockUI({
	                		css: {
	                			'text-align': 'left'
	                		}, 
	                		message: 'Module Pages packaged successfully!<br/><br/>The following StaticResources were updated, '
	                			+ 'or created if they did not exist before:<br/><ul><li>'
	                			+ srNames.join('</li><li>')
	                			+ '</ul>'
	                		, 
	                		timeout: 5000
	                	});
	                });

            	},
            	// FAILURE handler
            	function(failureObj){
            		$.blockUI({
            			message: 'There was an error creating the new StaticResource "' + failureObj.resourceName 
            				+ '":\n\n' + failureObj.errorMessage, 
            			timeout: 7500
            		});
            	}
	                
            );

        });

    });
    
    // Package Pages
    registerSnippet('skuid.pageList.packagePages',function(){
        var params = arguments[0],
            model = params.model,
            row = params.row,
            srDetails = { 
                "srName" : model.getFieldValue(row,'Name'),
                "srDescription" : model.getFieldValue(row,'Description')
            },
            tabs = $("input[name='tab-radio-PagePackDetailsTabSet']");
        
        // Check to see if we are creating a new Page Pack or updating and existing one
        $.each(tabs,function() {
            var tab = $(this);
            
            // If we are updating an existing Page Pack, get the Name and Description
            if (tab.prop('checked') === true && tab.val() === '1') {
                var existingModel = skuid.model.getModel('pgs__PagesInStaticResources'),
                    existingRow = existingModel.getRowById($("input:radio:checked[name='existingPagePack']").val());
                
                srDetails.srName = existingModel.getFieldValue(existingRow,'Name');
                srDetails.srDescription = existingModel.getFieldValue(existingRow,'Description');
            }
        });
        
        // Call the packaging snippet
        var snippet = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('skuid.page.packagePages');
        if (snippet) {
            snippet($.extend(params,srDetails));
        }
    });
    // Refresh Pages
    registerSnippet('skuid.pageList.refreshPages',function(){
        var params = arguments[0],
           srList = [],
           pagePackSelect = $('#pageSRSelect').find('input'),
           res;
        
        $.each(pagePackSelect,function() {
            var input = $(this),
                srName = input.val();
            
            if (srName !== null && input.prop('checked') === true) {
                srList.push(srName);
            }
        });
        
        if (srList.length > 0) {
            
            skuid.$.blockUI({
                message: 'Refreshing Pages in selected Static Resources...'
            });
            
            skuid.PageListControllerExtension.RefreshPagesFromStaticResource(JSON.stringify(srList),function(result,event) {
                skuid.model.getModel('pgs__pagedata').updateData(function() {
                    if (result && result.isSuccess === true) {
                        skuid.$.blockUI({
                            message: 'Success!', 
                            timeout: 1500
                        });
                    } else {
                        var errMsg = 'There was an error refreshing one or more pages';
                        
                        if (result && result.errorList && result.errorList.length > 0) {
                            errMsg += ':';
                            
                            $.each(result.errorList,function(i,val) {
                                errMsg += '<br/>\n<br/>\n' + (++i) + '. ' + val;
                            });
                        }
                        
                        skuid.$.blockUI({
                            message: errMsg, 
                            timeout: 7500
                        });
                    } 
                });
            });
        }
    });
    

})(skuid);</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="pagelistcss" cachelocation="false">.nx-page-region {
    margin: 17px;
}</cssitem>

  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-2nP3cm-32">
      <components>
        <pagetitle model="page" uniqueid="sk-2rE7LK-86">
          <maintitle>Edit Page XML - {{Name}}</maintitle>
          <subtitle>{{#skuid__Module__c}}Module: {{skuid__Module__c}}{{/skuid__Module__c}}{{^skuid__Module__c}}No Module{{/skuid__Module__c}}</subtitle>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" label="Save & Preview" window="self" icon="sk-icon-preview" snippet="saveAndPreview" uniqueid="SaveAndPreviewBtn">
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="p"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="p"/>
              </hotkeys>
            </action>

              <hotkeys/>

            <action type="savecancel" label="New Action">
              <savehotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
              </savehotkeys>
            </action>
          </actions>
        </pagetitle>
        <custom name="pageXMLEditor" uniqueid="sk-2rE7LK-87">
          <renderconditions/>
        </custom>
      </components>
    </pageregioncontent>
  </pageregioncontents>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="AceEditor" url="" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid" filepath="ace.js"/>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="PageXMLEditor">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    skuid.componentType.register('pageXMLEditor',function(element) {
	
    	var model = skuid.$M('page'),
    	    row = model.getFirstRow(),
    	    editor = new skuid.ui.Editor(element),
            xmleditor = null,
            bc = skuid.builder.core,
            pauselistening = false;
    
    	if (model) {
    		// Register that we will be editing our model.
    		// This will take care of adding Save and Cancel buttons to our header.
    		// However, we will hide these unless they are explicitly added in the 'actions' area.
    		editor.registerModel(model);
    	}
    	
        function getPageLayout() {
            return model.getFieldValues(row,bc.getLayoutFields(),true).join('');
        }

    	// Extend our editor's native handleCancel method
    	// so that we can rerender ourself
    	editor.handleCancel = function() {
    		// Run the prototype method
    		//skuid.ui.Editor.prototype.handleCancel.call(editor);
            
    		viewBuilderLink.removeClass('disabled');
    		if (xmleditor) {
    			pauselistening = true;
    			xmleditor.setValue(formatXml(getPageLayout()));
    			xmleditor.getSession().getSelection().clearSelection();
    			pauselistening = false;
    		}
    	};
    	
    	editor.handleSave = function() {
    		// Run the prototype method
    		//skuid.ui.Editor.prototype.handleSave.call(editor);
    		viewBuilderLink.removeClass('disabled');
    	};
    	
    	editor.handleChange = function() {
    		// Run the prototype method
    		//skuid.ui.Editor.prototype.handleChange.call(editor);
    		viewBuilderLink.addClass('disabled');
    	};
    	
    	function formatXml(xml) {
    		var formatted = '';
    		var reg = /(>)(<)(\/*)/g;
    		xml = xml.replace(reg, '$1\r\n$2$3');
    		var pad = 0;
    		jQuery.each(xml.split('\r\n'), function(index, node) {
    			var indent = 0;
    			if (node.match( /.+<\/\w[^>]*>$/ )) {
    				indent = 0;
    			} else if (node.match( /^<\/\w/ )) {
    				if (pad !== 0) {
    					pad -= 1;
    				}
    			} else if (node.match( /^<\w[^>]*[^\/]>.*$/ )) {
    				indent = 1;
    			} else {
    				indent = 0;
    			}
    	
    			var padding = '';
    			for (var i = 0; i < pad; i++) {
    				padding += '    ';
    			}
    	
    			formatted += padding + node + '\r\n';
    			pad += indent;
    		});
    	
    		return formatted;
    	}
    	
    	
    	function condenseXml(xml) {
    		return xml.replace(/(>)(\s*)(<)(\/*)/g,'$1$3$4');
    	}
    	var height = ((window.innerHeight - $('.sk-headerwrapper').outerHeight() -120) * 0.85) + 'px';
    	var wrapper = jQuery('<div id="wrapper">').css('height',height);
    	var textarea = jQuery('<div id="pagexmleditorbox">').addClass('nx-code-editor');
    	element.css('position','relative').css('height',height);
    	var invalid = jQuery('<div>Invalid XML</div>').addClass('nx-error').css({'position':'absolute','top':'4px','right':'4px'}).hide();
    	var viewBuilderLink = jQuery('<a>').addClass('nx-pagebuilder-viewxmllink').prop('href','/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id=' + row.Id).text('View/Edit in Page Builder');
    	wrapper.append(textarea);
    	element.append(wrapper,viewBuilderLink,invalid);
    	$(document.body).one('pageload',function() {

        	xmleditor = window.ace.edit('pagexmleditorbox');
        	xmleditor.getSession().setMode("ace/mode/xml");
        	xmleditor.setValue(formatXml(getPageLayout()));
        	xmleditor.getSession().getSelection().clearSelection();
        	textarea.show();
        	xmleditor.getSession().on('change',function() {
        		if (!pauselistening) {
        			var xmldoc;
        			try {
        				xmldoc = skuid.utils.makeXMLDoc(condenseXml(xmleditor.getValue()));
        				
        			}
        			catch(e) {
        				invalid.show();
        				return;
        			}
        			invalid.hide();
        			bc.save(xmldoc[0],model,row);
        		}
        	});
    
        });
    
    });
})(skuid);

</jsitem>

<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes">
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inlinecomponent" name="SkuidCentral" url="">elem.prop('id','wrapper');
var $ = skuid.$,
    
    // Top Section
    toprow = $('<div>'),
    divein = $('<div>').prop('id','divein'),

    <model id="stng__ModelDataSourceTypes" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Model_Service_Adapter__c" doclone="" type="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce">

        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__CredCounts" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="aggregate" sobject="skuid__Model_Service_Credential__c" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id" name="countId" function="COUNT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
      <groupby method="simple">
        <field id="skuid__Service_Name__c" name="ServiceName"/>
      </groupby>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__ModelDataSources" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" orderby="skuid__Adapter_Name__c, Name" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="salesforce" label="Data Source Type"/>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Authentication__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Authentication Method" defaultValue="none">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="none" label="No Authentication"/>
            <!--<entry value="apikey" label="API Key"/>-->
            <entry value="basicauth" label="Basic HTTP Authentication"/>
            <entry value="separateurl" label="Separate Authentication URL"/>
            <entry value="provider" label="Authentication Provider (OAuth, Custom, etc)"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Authentication_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Headers__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Password__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Org-wide Default Password"/>
        <field id="skuid__Username__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Org-wide Default Username"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Body__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Body_Content_Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Provider__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Scopes__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Permission_Name__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Body_Parameters__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Custom_Config__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_URL_Parameters__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Credential_Source__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="none" helptext="The level of specificity at which Usernames and Passwords can be stored. "Per User..." allows each user to enter their own username/password for this Data Source via the "My Credentials" UI, with Profile-level and Org-Wide credentials as optional cascading defaults. If "Shared: Per Profile" is used, then all users of a profile will share their profile's credentials, with Org-Wide credentials, if defined, being used as a default if no credentials are defined for that profile.">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="none" label="None"/>
            <entry value="org" label="Shared: Org-Wide"/>
            <entry value="profile" label="Shared: Per-Profile, with optional Org-wide Default"/>
            <entry value="user" label="Per-User, with optional Profile / Org-wide Defaults"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="AuthProviderMethod__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" label="Authentication Provider Method">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__AuthProviders","skuid__Auth_Method__c","Name",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="ShowCredentialSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Show Credential Source" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="none",false,
IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="provider" && ({{AuthProviderMethod__ui}}==="oauth1" || ({{AuthProviderMethod__ui}}==="oauth2" && {{AuthProviderGrantType}} !== "password")),false,IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="saml",false,true)))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="ShowUNPW__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Show Username/Password" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>(({{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="org" || {{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="profile" || {{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="user")) && {{ShowCredentialSource__ui}}</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthProviderGrantType" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" label="Authentication Provider Grant Type">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__AuthProviders","skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c","Name",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="StoredCredCount__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Stored Credentials Count" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" precision="17" scale="0">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__CredCounts","countId","ServiceName",{{{Name}}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Verb__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="POST">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="GET" label="GET"/>
            <entry value="POST" label="POST"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SFMyDomainURL__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="URL" label="Salesforce My Domain URL" defaultValue="" helptext="The API URL for your Salesforce org, e.g. "https://acme-widgets.my.salesforce.com"/>
        <field id="SFAuthMethod__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Authentication Method" defaultValue="provider">

          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="IsSalesforceService__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">

        </field>
        <field id="SFMyDomain__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="My Domain" defaultValue="" helptext="To connect to Salesforce orgs with Skuid, these orgs must use My Domain. To configure your org for My Domain, go to /domainname/DomainName.apexp?setupid=OrgDomain"/>
        <field id="ShowDataSourceTypeSelectionStep" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" ogdisplaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Name_Identifier_Field__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="federation_id" enclosevalueinquotes="true">

            <entry value="federation_id" label="Federation Identifier"/>
            <entry value="username" label="Username"/>
            <entry value="--" label="" disabled="true"/>

    <model id="stng__AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Secret__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
        <field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST">
          <picklistentries/>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__User_Info_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="explicit" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="explicit" label="Authorization Code"/>
            <entry value="saml2-bearer" label="SAML 2.0 Bearer Assertion"/>
            <entry value="implicit" label="Implicit"/>
            <entry value="password" label="Resource Owner Password Credentials"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Method__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="oauth2">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="apex" label="Custom Apex Authentication"/>
            <entry value="oauth2" label="OAuth 2.0 / OpenID"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_CompanyName" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Company Name"/>
        <field id="SP_SiteCollection" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Site Collection Path"/>
        <field id="SP_AuthUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Auth URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".sharepoint.com"+{{{SP_SiteCollection}}}+"/_layouts/15/OauthAuthorize.aspx"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_TokenUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Token URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://accounts.accesscontrol.windows.net/"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".onmicrosoft.com/tokens/OAuth/2"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthMethodType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Auth Method Type" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="apex","apex",
IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth1" || {{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth2","oauth","other"))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c"/>
        <field id="SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Token Req Body Params" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}==='sharepointonline','{"resource":"00000003-0000-0ff1-ce00-000000000000/'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.sharepoint.com@'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.onmicrosoft.com"}','')</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Default Scopes Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(
   (CONTAINS({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}},'oauth')&&({{skuid__Type__c}}=='salesforce')),
   IF({{skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c}}=='explicit',
      'full,refresh_token','api'
   ),
   ''
)
</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Assertion_Signing_Certificate__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Type__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="stng__AuthProviderType"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Auth_Method__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="stng__AuthProviderMethod"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Request_Headers__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{}"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Secret__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Auth_Method__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_AuthUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_AuthUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Default_Scopes__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>

  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-1uLo4g-22" defaultcontent="true">
      <components>
        <pagetitle model="stng__OrgPreferences" uniqueid="1424702947986-328">
          <maintitle>Skuid Settings</maintitle>
          <actions>
            <action type="savecancel" window="self">
              <models>
                <model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
                <model>stng__Themes_Desktop</model>
                <model>stng__Themes_Mobile</model>
                <model>stng__UserOrProfilePrefs</model>
                <model>stng__ModelDataSourceTypes</model>
                <model>stng__ModelDataSources</model>
                <model>stng__AuthProviders</model>
              </models>
              <savehotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
              </savehotkeys>
              <cancelhotkeys/>
            </action>
          </actions>
        </pagetitle>
        <tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" renderas="" uniqueid="1424702947987-329">
          <tabs>
            <tab name="User Licensing / Permissions" loadlazypanels="true" uniqueid="UserLicensing">
              <components>
                <template multiple="true" model="stng__OrgPreferences" allowhtml="true" uniqueid="1424702947987-333">
                  <contents><div class="nx-editor-header-title">To manually assign Skuid Licenses or Permission Sets to current Users, click one of these links:</div>
<div style="clear: both;">
<ol class="manual-license-actions">
{{#$Model.stng__SkuidPackageLicense.data.length}}
<li><a href="/ui/setup/mfpackage/UserLicenses/d?allPackageId=033G00000006Shv&packageLicenseId={{{$Model.stng__SkuidPackageLicense.data.0.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign / remove user <b>Licenses</b> to Skuid</a> (needed for anyone who will be using Skuid in any way)</li>
{{/$Model.stng__SkuidPackageLicense.data.length}}
<li><a href="/005?id={{{$Model.stng__Skuidstng__PermissionSets.data.2.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign users the <b>Skuid Page Viewer</b> Permission Set</a> (needed for anyone who will be using Skuid in any way)</li>
<li><a href="/005?id={{{$Model.stng__Skuidstng__PermissionSets.data.1.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign users the <b>Skuid Page Builder</b> Permission Set</a> (needed for all users who will be creating / editing Skuid Pages)</li>
<li><a href="/005?id={{{$Model.stng__Skuidstng__PermissionSets.data.0.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign users the <b>Skuid Admin</b> Permission Set</a> (needed to manage Skuid Settings and deploy Pages using Page Assignments )</li>
</ol>
</div></contents>
                </template>
                <template multiple="true" model="stng__OrgPreferences" allowhtml="true" uniqueid="1424702947987-334">
                  <contents><div class="nx-editor-header-title">Automatic Assignment and/or Revocation of Licenses and Permission Sets on User creation / activation / deactivation</div>
<div class="clearfix"/></contents>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                </template>
                <tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" renderas="" uniqueid="1424702947987-335">
                  <tabs>
                    <tab name="Organization Defaults">
                      <components>
                        <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="stng__OrgPreferences" buttonposition="" mode="read" layout="" uniqueid="1424702947987-336">
                          <columns>
                            <column width="50%">
                              <sections>
                                <section title="Package Licenses" collapsible="no">
                                  <fields>
                                    <field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                                    <field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Assignment__c" valuehalign="" type="CUSTOM" snippet="PackagesMultipicklist">
                                      <renderconditions logictype="and">
                                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__OrgPreferences" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c" value="true"/>
                                      </renderconditions>
                                    </field>
                                    <field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                                    <field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Revocation__c" valuehalign="" type="CUSTOM" snippet="PackagesMultipicklist">
                                      <renderconditions logictype="and">
                                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__OrgPreferences" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c" value="true"/>
                                      </renderconditions>
                                    </field>
                                  </fields>
                                </section>
                              </sections>
                              <renderconditions logictype="and">
                                <rendercondition fieldmodel="stng__SkuidPackageLicense" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                            </column>
                            <column width="50%">
                              <sections>
                                <section title="Permission Sets" collapsible="no">
                                  <fields>
                                    <field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c" valuehalign="" type=""/>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__MicrosoftDynamics" cachelocation="false">var args = arguments[0] || {},
    context = args.context || {},
    dataSourceRow = context.row || {},
    dataSourceName = dataSourceRow['Name'] || '',
    dataSourceUrl = dataSourceRow['skuid__URL__c'] || '',
    dataSourceProtocol = dataSourceUrl.split('//')[0]||'',
    dataSourceDomain = (dataSourceUrl.split('//')[1]||'').split('/')[0] || '',
    model = skuid.$M('msdynamics__DataSourceEditor'),
    prodVersion = 'crm_online',
    orgName = '<Your Organization\'s Name>',
    orgUrl = '<Your Organization\'s URL>';

if (!model) return;

if (dataSourceUrl.length > 0){
    if (dataSourceDomain.endsWith('crm.dynamics.com')){
        orgName = dataSourceDomain.slice(0,-17);
        orgUrl = dataSourceProtocol + '//' + dataSourceDomain;
    } else {
        prodVersion = 'crm_onpremise';
        orgName = null;
        orgUrl = dataSourceProtocol + '//' + dataSourceDomain;
    }
}

model.abandonAllRows();
model.createRow({additionalConditions:[
    { field: 'DataSourceName', value: dataSourceName },
    { field: 'ProductVersion', value: prodVersion },
    { field: 'OrgName',        value: orgName },
    { field: 'OrgUrl',         value: orgUrl }
]});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__MicrosoftDynamics_EditorModelUpdated" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$,
    url = params.row['ServiceEndpoint'],
    dataSourceName = params.row['DataSourceName'],
    dataSourceModel = skuid.$M('stng__ModelDataSources'),
    dataSourceRow = dataSourceModel && dataSourceModel.getRows([{field:'Name',value:dataSourceName}])[0];

if (!dataSourceRow) return;

dataSourceModel.updateRow(dataSourceRow,{
    'skuid__URL__c': url
});</jsitem>

  <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__MicrosoftOneDrive_EditorModelUpdated" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__SAPGateway" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$,
	context = params.context,
	model = context.model,
	row = context.row,
	isNewRecord = model.isRowNew(row);
if(isNewRecord) {
    model.updateRow(row, {
        skuid__Auth_Request_Headers__c: '{"X-CSRF-Token":"Fetch","Authorization":"Basic {{$Auth.BasicAuth}}"}',
        skuid__Auth_Request_Verb__c:'GET',
        skuid__Authentication_URL__c:'https://<SAP_DOMAIN>/sap/opu/odata/<PATH_TO_SERVICE>',
        skuid__Authentication__c:'separateurl',
        skuid__Credential_Source__c:'org',
        skuid__Request_Headers__c:'{"X-CSRF-Token":"{{$Auth.Response.Headers.x-csrf-token}}","Authorization":"Basic {{$Auth.BasicAuth}}"}',
        skuid__URL__c:'https://<SAP_DOMAIN>/sap/opu/odata/<PATH_TO_SERVICE>',
    });
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__OData" cachelocation="false">var args = arguments[0] || {},
    context = args.context || {},
    model = context.model || {},
    row = context.row || {},
    customConfigJSON = row['skuid__Custom_Config__c'] || '',
    customConfig = {};
    
if (!model) return;

try {
    customConfig = JSON.parse(customConfigJSON);
} catch(e) {}

model.updateRow(row, { 'ODataVersion__ui': customConfig['odata-version'] || "4.0" });</jsitem>

      <cssitem location="inline" name="ThemePicker" cachelocation="false">.theme-card {
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
    position:relative;
    border: 1px solid #dedede;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 1px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
}
.theme-card:focus, .theme-card:hover {
    border-color: #5b9dd9;
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(30,140,190,.8);
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(30,140,190,.8);
    box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(30,140,190,.8);
}
.theme-card.selected {
    border-color: orange;
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(245,150,17,1);
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(245,150,17,1);
    box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(245,150,17,1);
}

.themes-wrapper {
    width: 100%;
}
.theme-screenshot {
    width: 350px;
    height: 350px;
    overflow-y: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 42px;
}
.theme-label {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;

    border-top: 1px solid #dedede;
    background: #F6F6F6;
    color: #000;
    text-align: left;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 15pt;
}

</cssitem>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="Snippets" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    
	var $ = skuid.$,
	    registerSnippet = skuid.snippet.registerSnippet;
	
	// Utility functions for changing z-index
	registerSnippet('z99',function(){
	   $('#tb-holder').addClass('z99');
	   $('#tb-nav').addClass('z99');
	});
	
	registerSnippet('removeZ99',function(){
	   $('#tb-holder').removeClass('z99');
	   $('#tb-nav').removeClass('z99');
	});
	
	// Preview page
    registerSnippet('previewPage',function(){
        var params = arguments[0],
            pagePreview = skuid.snippet.get('skuid.builder.page.preview'),
            pageModel = skuid.$M('Page'),
            pageRow = params.row.PreviewPage__r;
        pageModel.adoptRow(pageRow);
        pagePreview && pagePreview({
            model: pageModel,
            row: pageRow,
            // Specify that we want to preview in context of a particular theme
            params: {
                usetheme: skuid.$M('Theme').data[0].Name
            }
        });
    });
	
})(skuid);</jsitem>

(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    
    // This event is published from a template on the global
    // because $.ready fires too early
    skuid.events.subscribe('firstPanelLoaded', function(){
        if(!this.executed){
            this.executed = true;
            $('input[type="checkbox"]').removeAttr('disabled');
        }
    });
    
    
    skuid.events.subscribe('skuid.mobile.mainPanelSet', function(tabId){
        $('input[type="checkbox"]').removeAttr('disabled');
    });
})(skuid);
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="ThemeBuilderHelper" cachelocation="false" url="">var DONT_LOAD_THEME = true;
var whiteList;
